DOC.brief_summary: Comparative Study Evaluate Cosmetic Appearance Two Brands ( Coopervision ( CVI ) v . Competitor ) Color Soft Contact Lenses
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Evaluate Cosmetic Appearance Two Brands ( Coopervision ( CVI ) v . Competitor ) Color Soft Contact Lenses .
DOC.detailed_description: Each lens pair comparison require two visit two day , follow : Visits : V1 ( lens dispense ) , V2 ( 20 minute post lens settle ) . Each subject randomize wear test control lenses series four short fit comparison .
DOC.criteria: Is 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) . Has selfreported visual exam last two year . Is adapted wearer spherical soft contact lens . Has contact lens spherical prescription 1.00 10.00 ( inclusive ) . Has spectacle cylinder 0.75 diopter ( D ) eye Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye . Has clear cornea active ocular disease . Has read , understood sign information consent letter . Is willing wear his/hers spectacle study contact lens . Is willing comply wear schedule . Is willing comply visit schedule . Has never wear contact lens . Currently wear rigid gas permeable contact lens . Has history achieve comfortable contact lens wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has contact lens prescription outside range 1.00 10.00D . Has spectacle cylinder â‰¥1.00D cylinder either eye . Does pair corrective spectacle time visit . Can achieve best correct spectacle distance visual acuity 20/30 ( 0.18 logMAR ) good eye . Presence clinically significant ( grade > 2.0 , scale 04 ) anterior segment abnormality . Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium , pinguecula , corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GCP ) bad grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) Seborrheic eczema , Seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene Has know history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) Has aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Has Presbyopia dependence spectacle near work contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is participate type eye related clinical research study .
